#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    vector <int> v1,v2;
    int x,t,n,ans,i,k;
    cin >> t;
    for(k=1;k<=t;k++){
        v1.clear();
        v2.clear();
        cin >> n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin >> x;
            v1.push_back(x);
        }
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            cin >> x;
            v2.push_back(x);
        }
        sort(v1.begin(),v1.end());
        sort(v2.begin(),v2.end());
        ans = 0;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
            ans += v1[i]*v2[n-i-1];
        }
        cout << "Case #" << k << ": " << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
